DarkMouse::

She causously walked in and sat down.
"Uh, well, Yeah. If you hook up with Drillbit, then you will stand a 
chance. ALso, these newcomers, those bat things.  Get them. I checked 
the base records.  They have more to them than you can see. Get them 
on your side as well. You'll take the others without too much trouble 
for sure."
 She sat there, her hands neatly folded in her lap, her legs 
crossed.  Her nose twitched.  She was nervous, and it showed a little.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Demise::
> 
> Killfest turns as he hears Darkmouse's voice. He looks at 
her. "Yes. 
> Things are looking to be turning quickly into a battle. I am here 
to 
> meet Drillbit shortly. You know the base and the troops better than 
> me, do you suggest I ally with DrillBit?"
> 
> He looks at Demise. Demise nods, recieving orders from Killfest 
> through the internal comm, and walks out of the room, heading for 
the 
> bridge.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > She walked into the room. "You wanted to see me?"
